data.title: When Jaya Bachchan addressed husband Amitabh Bachchan's love affair rumours with Rekha: 'My life would have been hell if...'
data.meta_description: In a vintage interview, Jaya Bachchan opened up about her emotions and addressed the persistent rumors swirling around her husband, Amitabh Bachchan's alleged involvement with Rekha during the late '70s. It's widely reported that these rumors took a toll on Jaya Bachchan, leading to a strained period in their marriage. There were even claims that Jaya had purportedly prohibited Amitabh from collaborating with Rekha, possibly in response to the turmoil caused by the speculations. During her interview with People's Magazine, Jaya Bachchan candidly confronted the affair rumors involving Amitabh Bachchan. She remarked, "If there was any, he would have been somewhere else, na? People liked them as a couple on-screen, and that's fine. The media tried linking him with every one of his heroines. My life would have been hell if I had taken it all seriously. We are made of sterner stuff." Despite Jaya ji's assertions, the persistent gossip surrounding Amitabh and Rekha's alleged romantic entanglement continues unabated.
data.text:
Janhvi Kapoor's Rakhi Moment with Paparazzo Labeled A 'Publicity Stunt' By Trolls

Janhvi Kapoor recently brought joy to a paparazzo by celebrating Rakhi with him. The 'Ulajh' actress, busy with Raksha Bandhan work, was seen in Bandra when shutterbugs requested her to tie Rakhi on the paparazzo's wrist. Janhvi happily obliged, tying the sacred thread on his wrist. The paparazzo then offered 'shagun' to Janhvi, to which she responded adorably. The video of this heartfelt moment quickly went viral, eliciting mixed reactions. While many applauded her humble gesture, some took to trolling her. Janhvi will next be seen in 'Devara' alongside NTR Jr. and Saif Ali Khan.

9 views | 6 hours ago

Natasa Preaches Patience In The Face of Hate; Internet Goes All Praise

Actress and model Natasa Stankovic has taken a moment to reflect and share her wisdom with fans. In a recent video, she emphasised the importance of slowing down and trusting in divine timing. The post comes amid recent online criticism, with many praising her graceful handling of the situation.

1090 views | 4 days ago

Richa Chadha Urges CM Mamata Banerjee for Impartial Investigation in Kolkata Case

Richa Chadha has expressed her deep concern over the horrific Kolkata rape and murder case by turning to social media, urging Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee to ensure swift and impartial justice. She emphasized the expectation of a fair investigation from Banerjee, who is currently the only female Chief Minister in India. The incident has sparked widespread outrage among activists, celebrities, and politicians, highlighting the pressing issue of women’s safety. Social media platforms are buzzing with reactions to the disturbing case. Previously, both Kangana Ranaut and Swara Bhasker had condemned the crime.

990 views | 5 days ago

Abhishek Bachchan Responds to Divorce Speculation Amid Viral Fake Video: Reports

Abhishek Bachchan has finally addressed the rumors about a split with his wife, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan. During a recent interview, he displayed his wedding ring and expressed his frustration over the speculation, while acknowledging that such rumours are part of celebrity life. Abhishek stated, 'I am still married. I don't have anything to say to you all about that. You all have blown the entire thing out of proportion, sadly. I understand why you do it; you have to file some stories. It's okay, we're celebrities, we have to take it.' The rumours started when Abhishek and Aishwarya attended separate events at the Ambani wedding, and were further fueled by Abhishek’s like on a post about divorce cases.

3469 views | 1 week ago
